title: Redundant skins
body:
I'm looking for a list of champions who's theme would match existing skin series a little too well. 

For example, 

Elderwood Iven
Underworld Kalista
Gravelord Yorick
...

I'm sure there are others that I'm not really thinking of, ...

replies.body:
Vandal Jinx
High Command Kled
~~Star Guardian Aurelion Sol~~

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7P7ahabV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-03T19:31:20.696+0000)
>

Oh and um ... 

> Vandal Jinx

... yeah, .. do it anyway!
Project or Program Orianna ... She is already a robot.
To be fair, Vlad isn't actually a vampire.

People may not like me for saying this one. 

Dark Star Aurelion Sol

His whole theme is about stars already. A slight recoloring would not be fitting of this line.
Instead of stars they could be *evil* stars

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7P7ahabV,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-03T19:30:29.727+0000)
>
> Instead of stars they could be *evil* stars


> ~~Star Guardian Aurelion Sol~~ 

Staaaaahp! lol
Academy Annie, she's in a kindergarten outfit already, so...
